title: Summary and Next Steps
body_html:
Summary and Next Steps

Summary

  • This guide defines a complete, production-ready webhook system for Huly
  • Two approaches: keep standalone, build integrated plugin (recommended)
  • Detailed specs, patterns, and deployment guidance included

Next Steps

  1. Implement Phase 1 (models, API, triggers, delivery)
  2. Add filters & metrics (Phase 2)
  3. Build admin UI and migration tooling
  4. Plan and execute cutover from standalone

Contributions

  • Please open issues/PRs to improve docs, add examples, or refine specs
